"Hero Twin Machineguns consume PP with their normal attacks.

Therefore, they use their Weapon Action, \"Reload\", to recover PP.

You can continue reloading by holding the Weapon Action button.

Also, if you reload with Just Attack timing, a \"Just Reload\" will occur and your PP will recover more quickly."
